page.title: 13Leisure in Stamford Bridge
page.content: In Stamford Bridge we have a sports centre that has been built from the old station shed.They play squash,badminton,basket ball and table tennis.Lots of people raise funds.eg. The Fun Run:Contestants run the 4 miles round High and Low Cattons,back to the village.We have 4 football teams.The School team,the Mitchell League,the Minor Leage and the Men's Seniors.We have a school cricket team, a boy's team and 2 men's teams.The ladies have 2 netball teams.An Art Club holds exhibitions of paintings in the Chapel Hall.At school there are Art Clubs in{macrame}and{ pottery,}run by the techers.A{flowering arranging } club meets in the village hall. Gardening is a very popular hobby in our village,and many people have extra allotments of land in which to grow vegetables or flowers.
